<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Current fix script performs following activities.
1. Deletes the un used roles - platform_document_management_delete, platform_document_management_writer, platform_document_management_reader
2. Sets the default values of the new added fields to ds_document table.
  inherited_access -  true
  share_access - false
  admins_access - true</description>
        <name>Document Services - SD Upgrade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var roleGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
roleGR.addQuery('name','IN','platform_document_management_delete,platform_document_management_reader,platform_document_management_writer');
roleGR.query();
if (roleGR.next()) {
	roleGR.deleteMultiple();
}

// Setting default values for the records created earlier. ie, during Rome release
// The below code must be removed from Tokyo as this fix script execution can potentially modify the documents created in SD

var gr = new GlideRecord('ds_document');
gr.query();

gr.inherited_access = true;
gr.share_access = false;
gr.admins_access = true;

gr.updateMultiple();]]></script>
